result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lucus Devere Vernon

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Lucus Devere Vernon not in court, in custody.  Attorney James Edgar Toran appeared by video for Lucus Devere Vernon.  Prosecuting attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense is requesting final pretrial and jury trial dates. Case is adjourned to 11-8-22 at 8:30 am for final pretrial and 11-16-22 at 8:30 am for jury trial.
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Lucus Devere Vernon not in court, in custody.  Attorney James Edgar Toran in court for Lucus Devere Vernon.  Prosecuting attorney Claire E Zyber in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense does not have discovery or an offer and is requesting a status conference.  Case is adjourned to 10-13-22 at 8:30 am for status conference by zoom.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed. Public Defender Order Appointing Counsel

Court ordered no contact with ANV.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3. 
Court ordered Defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY. 
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Lucus Devere Vernon appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney John Mathew Krejci appeared by video for Lucus Devere Vernon.  Prosecuting attorney Grant Ian Huebner appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
